陵夷.definition: to deteriorate; to decline; to slump; also written 凌夷

陵川.definition: Lingcuan county in Jincheng 晉城|晋城[Jin4 cheng2], Shanxi

陵川縣.definition: Lingcuan county in Jincheng 晉城|晋城[Jin4 cheng2], Shanxi

陵水.definition: Lingshui Lizu Autonomous County, Hainan; abbr. for 陵水黎族自治縣|陵水黎族自治县[Ling2 shui3 Li2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4]

陵水縣.definition: Lingshui Lizu Autonomous County, Hainan; abbr. for 陵水黎族自治縣|陵水黎族自治县[Ling2 shui3 Li2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4]

陵水黎族自治縣.pinyin: líng shuǐ lí zú zì zhì xiàn
